title: Thai Style Salmon and Rice with Red Curry Sauce

ingredients.item: 400ml can Bart Reduced Fat Coconut Milk
500ml pack Waitrose Cooks’ Ingredients Chicken Stock
35g sachet Blue Elephant Thai Red Curry Paste
4 Waitrose Scottish Salmon Fillets (approx 150g each), skins removed

instructions.step: Put the coconut milk, chicken stock, lemon grass and curry paste in a flameproof casserole dish with a lid, and bring to the boil, stirring with a wooden spoon until the paste dissolves.  Add the rice and green beans and simmer gently for 5 minutes.  Lay the salmon fillets on top of the rice. Season then cover and cook for a further 5-8 minutes until the rice is tender but not completely dry, and the fish is just cooked through.  Garnish with the coriander leaves and serve with lime wedges to squeeze over.
